name: Sisyphus goes up: You're going down
name_original: Sisyphus goes up: You're going down
description:
Are you good enough to escape the nine circles of hell? 

Sisyphus goes up: You're going down is a rage-inducing platformer. Play as Sisyphus as you carry a  small-medium-sized boulder out of the underworld as you navigate some of the most evil and punishing obstacle courses ever devised.

Status: In development with a free playable DEMO! The demo contains a quick tutorial level and Level one.

Development: Not going to lie It's going to take some time to finish this one. Testing the levels of a rage game has proven long and grueling but oddly fun.

Guess what. 

The game has already started. The download is at the bottom of this pedestal. 

See you at the bottom mortal.

Keep Going champ you're almost there.

You're doing great!

So close now. 

Just a bit farther down.

You're so close to that download button. 

Ok, I'll level with you. 

You've scrolled about  25% of the way down but since we're totally friends I'm going to cut you a break.

In one of these 3 pots is a link that will skip to the Download button.  Click the wrong one and you'll reload the page and have to start scrolling all over again.

                                       

You got me. 

 All the pots are traps to reload the page. 

You are actually 98%  of the way down.

Here's your Download. You earned it.
